thread.title: MT Business Technologies announces move to Columbus Arena District
thread.title_full: MT Business Technologies announces move to Columbus Arena District

author: admin
title: MT Business Technologies announces move to Columbus Arena District
text:
MT Business Technologies 
COLUMBUS, Ohio, Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- MT Business Technologies (MTBT), a leading supplier of office technology solutions, announced today that it will be moving its Columbus-area sales office to Downtown Columbus. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278637LOGO 
MTBT's central Ohio office employs 30 people and is currently located in Westerville. The move to the Columbus Arena District will be completed in December, and reflects the company's commitment to the city as well as the attractiveness of an urban setting to current employees and potential hires. 
"We are thrilled to announce our move to Downtown Columbus, where MTBT will contribute to the city's economy by bringing 30 jobs to the Arena District," said MTBT president Chuck Rounds. "And by increasing MTBT's proximity to our customers in key industries like health care and education, we can play a larger role in helping companies, health systems and educational providers operate more efficiently and effectively, benefiting the city and the region as a whole." 
MTBT is headquartered in Mansfield, Ohio, but has significant operations in Cleveland, Columbus and Toledo. The company provides office solutions including innovative document and network management, managed print services, copier servicing and maintenance and managed IT support. MTBT's customers work in industries such as health care, education, financial services, manufacturing, government and the non-profit sector. 
"We have had our eye on the Arena District for a while, and as a company we are thrilled to join such a thriving and growing community," said Rounds. "The explosive growth of Downtown Columbus as a place to both live and work makes it a very attractive place for MTBT - both as a business opportunity and as an employee recruitment tool. Columbus provides us a young, well-educated and motivated workforce, which is vital as our company continues to grow." 
MTBT is the nation's largest independent RICOH dealer, allowing for "first in line" customer support and advanced knowledge of and access to new products and solutions. MTBT has also been awarded the HP Office Printing Solution Elite Partner status, placing the company among the top 1 percent of all HP partners in the United States. 
About MT Business Technologies: MTBT is a privately held third-generation office solutions firm, founded as Mansfield Typewriter in 1918. The company's headquarters remain in Mansfield, and MTBT now has major operations in Cleveland, Columbus and Toledo. MTBT provides total office solutions with an emphasis on managed printing services, managed IT support, document management and copier servicing and maintenance. It is the largest independent RICOH dealer in the United States. Learn more at www.mtbt.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mt-business-technologies-announces-move-to-columbus-arena-district-300162875.html 
SOURCE MT Business Technologies
